stateful.title: Stateful
stateful.description: The switch remains on instead of being automatically turned off.

reverse.title: Reverse
reverse.description: The switch's default state is on.

time.title: Time
time.description: The switch will turn off after this number of milliseconds. Not used if the switch is stateful.

random.title: Random
random.description: Randomize the time until a switch turns off. Not used if the switch is stateful.

resettable.title: Resettable
resettable.description: The timer will reset each time the switch is turned on.

disableLogging.title: DisableLogging
disableLogging.description: No state change information (On/Off) will be logged.
